snippet.title: The Plumber Thing
snippet.description:
I made a small humorous horror puzzle metroidvania this month! It's part of the Click-or-Treat Halloween bundle where a couple solo devs gathered together to make games. Windows only, alas.

Click-or-Treat bundle: https://itch.io/b/1601/click-or-treat-2022
The Plumber Thing on Itch: https://hempuli.itch.io/the-plumber-thing
